resources.string: New Application Update Is Ready To Download. By Installing This Update , App Will Get Most Latest Features Available
New Mandatory Application Update Is Ready To Download, This Will Help You To Get Better User Experience By Getting Most Latest Features & Security
Sahas Collects some of the information from the users who want to purchase the course , these information are collected in order to server other users better in future

Are You facing challenge to login into your account due to invalid device error ? If you had lastly used any other device then in order to open your account here , kindly raise Change Device Request by Providing your email below. 

Here are the steps to raise Device Reset Request
1) Enter Email Address
2) Press Raise Request Button
3) OTP Verification
4) Device Reset Request Will be raised

In order to server you better , Sahas Mobile Application requires few permissions.Users must need to grant those all permissions for executing and processing application further. Sahas Mobile application does not steal or misuse any of the user data , the usage of permission and data are mentioned in the privacy policy of sahas education official website : http://sahasinstitute.com
